item.title: K8S | 集群资源监控 heapster
item.description: 安装heapster的原因 查看dashboard状态 $ sudo kubectl get pods --all-namespaces | grep dashboard kubernetes-dashboard dashboard-metrics-scraper-6b4884c9d5-mvnb9 1/1 Running 0 40m kubernetes-dashboard kubernetes-dashboard-d7f7f565d-zhpsc 1/1 Running 0 40m 查看dashboard的日志 $ sudo kubectl logs -f -n kubernetes-dashboard kubernetes-dashboard-d7f7f565d-zhpsc 日志遇到这样的情况 No metric client provided. Skipping metrics. 2020/08/03 09:02:22 [2020-08-03T09:02:22Z] Outcoming response to 192.168.84.241:40086 with 200 status code 2020/08/03 09:02:23 Metric client health
